title: Foreign currency appreciates, cuts trade deficit

content.question: An increase in which of the following would reduce the United States balance-of-trade deficit?

choices.label: United States demand for foreign goods
United States rate of inflation compared to other countries
The value of foreign currency relative to the United States dollar
United States interest rates compared to other countries

content.answer: The value of foreign currency relative to the United States dollar

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
